# Seigr Toolset Crypto Documentation

Comprehensive technical documentation for STC v0.3.1 "High-Performance Streaming & Enhanced Security"

## Documentation Structure

### Getting Started

- **[User Manual](user_manual/)** - Step-by-step guides for beginners
  - [Getting Started](user_manual/01-getting-started.md) - Installation and first steps
  - [Basic Encryption](user_manual/02-basic-encryption.md) - Simple usage examples
  - [Security Features](user_manual/03-security-features.md) - Understanding STC security
  - [Advanced Usage](user_manual/04-advanced-usage.md) - Power user features
  - [Troubleshooting](user_manual/05-troubleshooting.md) - Common issues and solutions

### Technical Documentation

- **[Architecture](architecture.md)** - System design with Phase 2 streaming architecture
- **[API Reference](api-reference.md)** - Complete API documentation with v0.3.1 streaming features
- **[Core Modules](core-modules.md)** - Detailed module specifications
- **[Usage Guide](usage-guide.md)** - Practical code examples for all features
- **[Performance Guide](PERFORMANCE.md)** - Optimization strategies and benchmarks
- **[Security Guide](security-guide.md)** - Best practices and threat model
- **[Migration Guide](migration-guide.md)** - Upgrading from v0.3.0 to v0.3.1 (Phase 2 Streaming)
- **[Testing](testing.md)** - Test suite and validation procedures

## What's New in v0.3.1

- **Entropy Health API** - Monitor and enforce encryption quality
- **Enhanced Decoy Polymorphism** - Variable-size decoys with timing randomization
- **Context-Adaptive Morphing** - Dynamic algorithm adaptation
- **Adaptive Difficulty Scaling** - Oracle attack detection and mitigation
- **Streaming Support** - Process large files efficiently
- **Optimized Performance** - 2.9x faster while maintaining full security

See [CHANGELOG.md](../CHANGELOG.md) for complete version history.
